content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[pool_table]
( 
	[CorrelationId] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[OperationName] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[EventCategory] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Time] [datetime]  NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[EventInitiated by] [varchar](1000)  NULL,
	[ResourceType] [varchar](1000)  NULL,
	[ResourceGroup] [varchar](1000)  NULL,
	[Resource] [varchar](2000)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ([OperationName]), --just provide only distribution 
	CLUSTERED INDEX ([ResourceType])	 --form index on the where clause
)
GO

CREATE INDEX EventCategoryIndex on [pool_table] ([EventCategory]) --how you create none clustered index but also an additional index

--you can also create clustered index after the create table command has been executed

DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('[dbo].[pool_table]')

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[pool_table]
